Welcome! This guide describes the methods used at the MPCA to analyze air monitoring data. The charts and code found in this guide were produced using the free statistical software R.   

To follow along with the examples download a copy of R to your computer from the [r-project](https://cran.r-project.org/) or use [Rstudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/) in your browser. You can also download the free [R Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/) software, which makes R easier to use and helps keep your analysis projects organized.
